PathOfBuilding.Notes:
==================================================================================================================== INTRODUCTION ==================================================================================================================== The Herald of Agony Juggernaut is an incredibly tanky character that excels in remaining safe during while passively dealing damage. By utilizing Trigger craft, Herald of Agony as your damage source, and Storm Brand to stack Poison/Virulence with The Golden Rule, you will have a lot of free time to deal with mechanics while not sacrificing DPS uptime.
Pros: Very tanky Forgiving bosser, great at helping you focus/learn mechanics of fights Great at farming "Uber Uber" Labs (Gift/Tribute/Dedication to the Goddess), which deal a lot more damage than normal Uber Lab Core Uniques are typically very cheap in Softcore, due to the build being more catered towards Hardcore Very little effort to play
Cons: SLOW Mapper, suggested as a reroll after atlas progression and having farmed some currency Gearing resists/attributes can be annoying due to lots of uniques. You will get a lot of this on jewels Highly encouraged to level as a different build until ~60-80 Herald of Agony can have poor targeting/be frustrating to play with, use Predator/Convocation to help alleviate this
Trees: Leveling with Ground Slam Early game with/without Stabilising Sceptre (No Cluster) - White/Yellow Maps Mid/Late Game trees with Large Cluster (Recommended) and Medium Cluster (less damage, more Life) - Red Maps Late game Xibaqua - Heavily Bossing Focussed
==================================================================================================================== GENERAL TIPS ====================================================================================================================
Bandits: Kill All
Zizaran's HOAG character is named ZizaranSuffering
You get FREE respec points as you progress through the campaign and can complete additional side quests for more
The items in this guide are are a GUIDELINE, listed with the main core stats you're looking for More/higher stats (resists, attributes, etc) are always better! They are mostly kept reasonable and obtainable through self-crafting methods post-Harvest nerfs
On trade leagues you can search for "Empty Suffixes" or "Empty Prefixes" with a value of 1 for items with open crafting slots
Upgrade your Pantheons
Take Elemental Equilibrium until you have Stabilising Sceptre
This build lacks Dexterity and Intelligence, so try your best to get it on Jewels/Amulet Implicit (Turquoise)/Gear where you can
Take +30 Dex/Int nodes as you need them
DO NOT GET "COLD DAMAGE TO SPELLS" ON GEAR, It will mess up your Elemental Equilibrium
Any sources of Chaos/Physical damage to Spells will cause you to Poison yourself for more damage
GLOOM SHRINE/ASENATH'S GLOVES WILL KILL YOU DUE TO SELF-POISONING FROM THE MONSTER EXPLOSIONS
==================================================================================================================== LEVELING ====================================================================================================================
Leveling as Herald of Agony can be unpleasant and not recommended as a first character unless experienced with it. The leveling tree in this build will cover leveling with Ground Slam up until around level 70, but you should level with whatever you're comfortable with You can technically start playing Herald of Agony around level 31 once you have access to Poison Support.
https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1009497674?t=1h49m12s
VOD of Ziz leveling with Ground Slam
==================================================================================================================== GEM LINKS ====================================================================================================================
4L Herald of Agony in +3/Minion Damage Helmet: Herald of Agony - Damage on Full Life - Predator - Pierce (Mapping) / Vile Toxins (Bossing) 4L: Storm Brand (LEVEL 1) - Lesser Poison (LEVEL 6) - Poison - Faster Casting 4L: Hatred - Generosity | Flame Dash | Convocation 3L (Trigger Weapon): Desecrate | Flesh Offering | Sniper's Mark 3L: Vigilant Strike | Vaal Molten Shell | Enduring Cry
Can use The Embalmer gloves or a 6L until you have crafted a +3/Minion Damage Helmet: Embalmer 4L: Herald of Agony - Damage on Full Life - Predator - Pierce 6L: Herald of Agony - Damage on Full Life - Predator - Minion Damage - Vicious Projectiles - Pierce (Mapping) / Vile Toxins (Bossing)
Enduring Cry on left click once you have Call to Arms
Manually cast or CWDT skills in Trigger Weapon until you have Trigger crafted
Convocation and Predator Support (Signal Prey) are used to improve Agony's targeting
Make sure your Granite Flask is on when using Vaal Molten Shell to get maximum value
==================================================================================================================== AURAS / MANA RESERVATION ====================================================================================================================
Herald of Agony
Hatred
Aspect of Spider - If you have Herald of Agony Reservation Helmet Enchant + Reservation Circle of Nostalgia This must be crafted onto an item as a suffix using Fenumus, First of the Night. Amulet is typically a good slot for this on this build
Summon Skitterbots can be used instead of Aspect of Spider, but it requires you to run an Unset or drop a gem (not recommended)
You will want the Herald of Agony has 30% Reduced Reservation Enchant on an ilvl 86+ Elder Helmet, ideally Bone Helmet
==================================================================================================================== FLASKS ====================================================================================================================
Forbidden Taste (High roll 95%+) Granite Flask of Iron Skin Quartz Flask of Staunching/Warding Chemist's (23%+) Basalt Flask of Staunching/Warding or Jade Flask Quicksilver Flask of Adrenaline
Non-specified prefixes can be Experimenter's, Chemist's, Ample
If you get a Corrupted Blood Immune Jewel, you can swap Staunching suffix with Grounding
==================================================================================================================== I CAN'T POISON / KEEP UP VIRULENCE!!!!! ====================================================================================================================
Make sure you are using The Golden Rule Jewel
Map might have "Monster have a % Chance to Avoid Poison"
Lesser poison needs some levels! This is because monsters with high damage reduction/chaos resistance can reduce our chaos damage from Lesser Poison to 0, making the hit not inflict poison.
==================================================================================================================== KEEP DYING :( ====================================================================================================================
Make sure you keep your Endurance Charges up with Enduring Cry
Cap your resists even without Endurance Charges up
Do not touch Gloom Shrine or use Physical/Chaos Explosions (example: Asenath's Gloves, Profane Bloom)
==================================================================================================================== ANOINTMENT ====================================================================================================================
Gravepact - Azure Black Black
If you take Gravepact manually, you can anoint Crystal Skin for more Maximum Resistances to be even tankier
Crystal Skin - Sepia Black Silver
==================================================================================================================== Optional Passives ====================================================================================================================
Diamond Skin - Can help with capping resistances early until you optimize your gear
Precision - Dex is highly required on this build, and Movement Speed is always nice. 1 Point with Thread of Hope
+30 Dex/Int as you need them
==================================================================================================================== Crafting Helmet ====================================================================================================================
By using a Elder or Elder/Shaper Helmet, we can 6+ Link our Herald of Agony and use a Kaom's Heart.
Early Game: None. Use a 6L Chest or The Embalmer for your Herald of Agony
Mid Game: +3 Minion Gems/Minion Damage (Any Level) Elder Helmet
Crafting: Use Bound/Dense/Pristine (1/7 on average) or Bound Fossils (1/15 on average) on an ilvl 86 Elder Helmet
Late Game: +3 Minion Gems/Minion Damage (Any Level)/Hypothermia (Any Level) Helmet
Use Bound and Frigid Fossils on an ilvl 86 Elder+Shaper Helmet. 69 tries on average You can make this base by using an Awakaner's Orb on a Shaper Helmet onto an ilvl 86+ Elder Helmet (Preferably Bone Helmet) or vice versa Can preroll Minion Damage on Elder Helmet and Hypothermia on Shaper Helmet in case you get lucky and hit +3 Minion on the Awakener's Orb Make sure they are the only influence mod on each item before Awakener's Orb
IF YOU HIT COLD DAMAGE TO SPELLS ON PREFIX, YOU WILL NEED TO ANNUL IT OR BEASTCRAFT REMOVE PREFIX/ADD SUFFIX
Tip: If you hit +1/+2 Minion Gems and Minion Damage/Hypothermia, you can use Harvest "More Likely" craft to try to change it to +3 You can also craft life ore a resist before you do this in an attempt to make it a non-crafted stat on the resulting item Keep in mind it can hit a low life/resist roll
"Reforge a Rare item, being much more likely to receive the same modifier types"
Harvest Reforge Cold Method (Potentially more expensive): If you have a +3 Minion/Minion Damage Helmet on a Shaper/Elder Base, you can Prefixes Can't Be Changed + Harvest Reforge Cold More Likely in an attempt to add Hypothermia to the suffixes. This takes 2 exalts a try (to craft Prefixes Can't Be Changed) IF YOU HAVE AN OPEN PREFIX, IT CAN GET FILLED WITH A MOD EVEN THOUGH YOU HAVE PREFIXES CAN'T BE CHANGED
Craftofexile: https://pastebin.com/4CQ4PJCB
==================================================================================================================== Crafting Stabilising Sceptre ====================================================================================================================
You want to use a Stabilising Sceptre in this build, as it saves you points traveling to Elemental Equilibrium.
T1 Crafted Minion Damage is from Temple of Atzoatl Minion Room Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Use a Skill is a weapon unveil Can have 3 Crafted Mods is from The Pale Court fight Cannot Roll Attack Mods is from completing The Plaguemaw V Prophecy chain
+1 Recipe Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3axILYAJ2hQ
Early Game Sceptre (+1 Physical Spell Skill Gems or Deafening Fear):
Use the +1 Gem Vendor Recipe for + 1 to Physical Spell Skill Gems (Vendor White Stabilising Sceptre + 40% quality of gems with the Physical tag) Aug/Regal If you hit Cold Damage to Spells, scour and try again as this conflicts with Elemental Equilibrium Craft Trigger a Socketed Spell when You Use a Skill
A similar damage alternative is using a Defeaning Essence of Fear
Mid Game Sceptre (3 Crafted Mods +1 Physical Sceptre with Minion Damage and Trigger Socketed Spells): Crafts cost 2 Exalts and 7 Chaos
Use the +1 Gem Vendor Recipe for + 1 to Physical Spell Skill Gems (Vendor White Stabilising Sceptre + 40% quality of gems with the Physical tag) Regal, you can do a few attempts to hit a useful mod like Cast Speed or a Resistance since you will be using this for a while If you hit Cold Damage to Spells, scour and try again as this conflicts with Elemental Equilibrium Craft Can Have 3 Crafted Mods, Minion Damage, Trigger Socketed Spells
Craftofexile: https://pastebin.com/3inrchqC
Late Game Sceptre (+1 Spell, +1 Physical, Can have 3 crafted mods, requires Harvest Physical Augment): This sceptre can be annoying to craft and is very unnecessary Harvest Augment Physical is around 5 ex in Ultimatum Softcore, Crafts cost 3-5 Exalts, 7 Chaos
Fossil Combo Corroded Metallic Shuddering on ilvl 82 or LOWER Stabilising Sceptre, as 83 adds Chaos Damage Average to hit +1 Spells is 1/11 tries Once you hit +1 Spells, annul until 2 Open Prefixes and Open Suffix, make sure NO Cold Damage to Spells If you annul off +1 Spells, start over Craft Can't Roll Attack Mods, Harvest Augment Physical (Always hits +1 Physical) If you do not have 2 open suffixes, Craft Prefixes Can't Be Changed + Use a Scour Craft Can Have 3 Crafted Mods, Minion Damage, Trigger Socketed Spells
Craftofexile: https://pastebin.com/5Vkf8U0G
Alteration/Augment for +1 Spell Skill Gem is not recommended. It is on average around 1600-2000 alterations depending on ilvl, lower being better
Fracture Sceptre: Fractured Minion Damage, +1 Spell, +1 Physical, Multimod, Minion Attack/Cast Speed, Trigger This sceptre can be difficult to craft and is very unnecessary The crafting method is same as above. You will have to use Chaotic resonators, as you can not scour Fractured items white
Use Harvest Fracture Prefix or 1/5 until you successfully fractured Deafening Essence of Fear's Minion Damage
Craftofexile: https://pastebin.com/yvX9DmSK
==================================================================================================================== Cluster Jewels ====================================================================================================================
1 Large Cluster can provide us more damage while dropping a little life. If you'd like more life, stick to 1 Medium Cluster
Large Cluster Options:
8 Point Minion Damage with Renewal, Call to the Slaugher, and Rotten Claws or Raze and Pillage (You do not take these 2, they just allow you to get a better notable order)
Crafting: ilvl 50-67 8 Point Minion Damage Large Cluster Jewel, 68+ is a little less likely but still works Bound + Jagged Fossil Combo
Medium Cluster Options:
Option 1: 4 or 5 Point Exerted Attacks Deal 20% Increased Damage with Lead by Example and Cry Wolf or Haunting Shout
Why: Lead By Example grants you and HOAG Onslaught, which is a large quality of life and DPS increase Haunting Shout will intimidate enemies taunted by Enduring Cry, which is a large DPS increase Cry Wolf will give you Endurance Charges every time you Enduring Cry, even if no enemies are nearby. This is good for less experienced players who may accidentally drop charges
Crafting: ilvl 68+ for Cry Wolf, Otherwise 50+, 4 or 5 Point Exerted Attacks Deal 20% Increased Damage Medium Cluster Jewel Harvest Reforge Attack if you want Cry Wolf, otherwise, Chaos, Scour Alch, or Alt Aug Regal as you can not target the other notables
Option 2 (Bossing Jewel): 4 or 5 Point Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments with Chilling Presence (used for Bossing) Do not need a second notable, but Astoning Affliction is considerable for more chill effect
Why: While our Herald of Agony chills from Hatred and Grip of the Council, it will not consistently chill endgame bosses for Hypothermia The radius on this is a little small, so you'll want to keep relatively close to the bosses when you can
Crafting: Frigid Fossil or Harvest Reforge Cold/Cold More Likely on an ilvl 75+ 4 or 5 Point Effect of Non-Damaging Ailments Medium Cluster Jewel
Option 3 (Mapping Jewel): 4 or 5 Point Minion Damage while you have a Herald with Pure Agony and Cult-Leader
Why: It is difficult to maintain the +5 Virulence from Pure Agony while bossing due to cast speed, but it is easy to maintain while mapping
Crafting: ilvl 68+ 4 or 5 Point Minion Damage while you have a Herald Medium Cluster Jewel Bound Fossil
Small Cluster Options:
You will most likely want to use the Small Cluster jewel sockets for Life/Resistance jewels to help you reach resistance cap
You can use Born With Chaos on Small 2 or 3 Point Chaos Resistance Cluster Jewels if you're using Xibaqua (More Below)
Crafting: ilvl 78+ (Born of Chaos is 68, but 73 and 78 unlock higher Chaos Resistance suffixes) 2 or 3 Point Chaos Resistance Small Cluster Jewel Aberrant Fossil or Harvest Reforge Chaos/Chaos More Likely
Tip: Remember that you can get resistances/attributes you need on Cluster Jewel suffixes You can also swap/augment the resistances (suffixes) using Harvest
==================================================================================================================== Very Defensive Setup - Glorious Vanity Xibaqua ====================================================================================================================
Divine Flesh from the Glorious Vanity Xibaqua jewel can add a huge layer of mitigation to this build You would place this in the top left to convert Avatar of Fire
This tree removes Call to Arms/Soul of Steel for more passives This means you will have to manually warcry and pay better attention to your charges while mapping You can path to Gravepact manually and anoint Crystal Skin to compensate for the Maximum Resistance loss This setup is more suited for pure bossing, but try the build without Xibaqua before incorporating it into your build
There is a tree included to demonstrate this. However, keep in mind this requires you to hit 90%+ chaos resistance through gear
On this build, you can give up Agony Crawler Damage on Circle of Nostalgia for Chaos Resistance while affected by Herald of Agony Or run 2 Circle of Nostalgias, one with Reduced Reservation/Crawler damage and one with Reduced Reservation/Chaos Resistance You can use Noxious Catalyst to increase the amount of Chaos Resistance the ring grants
Born of Chaos Small Cluster Jewel should be used to further push your Maximum Chaos Resistance for more mitigation 3 point lets you trade 1 extra point for 12% Chaos Resistance and stats from the jewel
Crafting: ilvl 78+ (Born of Chaos is 68, but 73 and 78 unlock higher Chaos Resistance suffixes) 2 or 3 Point Chaos Resistance Small Cluster Jewel Aberrant Fossil or Harvest Reforge Chaos/Chaos More Likely
==================================================================================================================== Redblade Banner ====================================================================================================================
The Redblade Banner has the line "Warcries Have Infinite Power" You can wear this in your offhand and swap to it before you Enduring Cry to refill your Endurance Charges without the Warcry Medium Cluster Notable "Cry Wolf" If you do use this strategy, make sure you do not have Aspect of the Spider crafted on your weapon or you will lose it while swapping
==================================================================================================================== Awakened / Alt Quality Gems ====================================================================================================================
Awakened Generosity
Divergent Flesh Offering
Anomalous Poison allows you to drop Lesser Poison as long as you have a source of Physical/Chaos Damage to Spells (Circle of Nostalgia works) This allows you to use a different link like Culling Strike or open up a socket to run Summon Skitterbots over Aspect of the Spider
==================================================================================================================== Crit HOAG ====================================================================================================================
This is VERY unrealistic, but worth mentioning
You can push HOAG even further by getting "Socketed Spells have +3% To Critical Strike Chance" on your Helmet
With Vicious Bite on Large Minion Damage Cluster Jewel and Aura Medium Cluster Jewels with Vengeful Commands and Precise Commands, your HOAG gets a sizable amount of critical strike chance and multiplier
====================================================================================================================
